name: dawn-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves a male kirlia into gallade or a female snorunt into froslass.
short_effect: Evolves a male Kirlia into Gallade or a female Snorunt into Froslass.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.
